# Silent Table (Spell)
## Overview
[[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 5-ft.-diameter emanation centered on an object or a point in space

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None (object)

**Spell Resistance:** No (object)

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 192

You protect an area against casual eavesdropping. Sounds and sonic effects that originate inside the area are muffled for anyone outside the area; [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] DCs to hear or understand sounds leaving the area increase by 20, and any saving throw DCs of these effects decrease by 2. The spell does not affect sounds that enter the area or the [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks of creatures inside it.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2 to Level.
